text: The Tank 700 is a full-size Luxury SUV made by Great Wall Motor(GWM)'s Tank brand since 2024. == History and Features == The Tank 400 was launched in 2024 with sales in China starting in February of the same year. It is the fourth car to be launched under the Tank brand. The SUV is a Plug-in hybrid, having a 3.0 liter turbocharged petrol engine that is combined with an electric motor. The 700 also has a 2.4 liter turbodiesel engine, all with a 9-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Tank 700 is currently sold in China but also in Kazakhstan. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Tank 700
